direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check for the presence of elements in the collection, but containsAll checks for all elements in the specified collection.
Both methods handle similar exceptions (e.g., UnsupportedOperationException) and operate on the same underlying collections.
Both methods interact with the same underlying collections and use a CollectionMutator for operations.
Both methods iterate over the collections and perform boolean checks, though they serve different purposes.
Both methods iterate over the collections and perform operations on them, though size() aggregates the sizes.
Both methods involve operations on the elements of the collections, though removeIf uses a predicate for filtering.
Both methods modify the collection based on the presence of elements, though retainAll retains only the specified elements.
Both methods involve iterating over the collections, though toArray() converts the elements to an array.
Both methods involve operations on the collections, though toCollection() returns a new collection.
